title: Poll: Who Did The Best BLACK SABBATH Or OZZY OSBOURNE Cover Song At Back To The Beginning?
description: There are quite a few good ones to choose from. The post Poll: Who Did The Best BLACK SABBATH Or OZZY OSBOURNE Cover Song At Back To The Beginning? appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: There are quite a few good ones to choose from.
text: Poll Poll: Who Did The Best BLACK SABBATH Or OZZY OSBOURNE Cover Song At Back To The Beginning? There are quite a few good ones to choose from. At the Back To The Beginning farewell concert for Black Sabbath and Ozzy Osbourne, an all-star lineup of rock and metal giants came together to honor the godfathers of heavy metal with a powerful array of cover songs. Each band selected a classic Black Sabbath or Ozzy Osbourne track that resonated with their own style, creating a night that felt both reverent and electrifying. So now that you've seen them all (or at least you can see them all right here), we've got one question for you – who did the best cover song? We'll close this poll out Tuesday night and publish the results on Wednesday, July 9. Want More Metal? html:
Poll

Poll: Who Did The Best BLACK SABBATH Or OZZY OSBOURNE Cover Song At Back To The Beginning?

There are quite a few good ones to choose from.

At the Back To The Beginning farewell concert for Black Sabbath and Ozzy Osbourne, an all-star lineup of rock and metal giants came together to honor the godfathers of heavy metal with a powerful array of cover songs. Each band selected a classic Black Sabbath or Ozzy Osbourne track that resonated with their own style, creating a night that felt both reverent and electrifying.

So now that you've seen them all (or at least you can see them all right here), we've got one question for you – who did the best cover song? We'll close this poll out Tuesday night and publish the results on Wednesday, July 9.
